participant_abstract.sent: I think the design presentation was innovative and new and over all we've made major head way.
Although there were some cut backs due to budget constraints, overall I am pleased.
I think I came into this meeting highly underprepared, having not seen the prototype or with any guidelines about my final project presentation.

participant_decisions.sent: Disregard the solar power option because of budget.
Thatover all things went well and our business here is concluded.

participant_problems.sent: Difficulty choosing which elements to cut out.
